TEXT1: Angular is an application-design framework and development platform for creating efficient and sophisticated single-page apps.
TEXT2: These Angular docs help you learn and use the Angular framework and development platform, from your first application to optimizing complex single-page applications for enterprises. Tutorials and guides include downloadable examples to help you start your projects.
TRANSLATED_BY_COMPONENT: These docs assume that you are already familiar with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and some of the tools from the latest standards, such as classes and modules.
MODULE_SOME_TEXT: This is an example how to use translations in another modules
